message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.CY, cs.LG 

This paper deals with identifying offensive content in social media using machine learning models, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves data annotation and dataset creation, which could fall under cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). The use of machine learning models for classification also falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of offensive content in social media, which could fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
